reviewtext: After careful consideration, our family bought a Kodak DC-280.This camera looks great- USB, zoom, LCD panel, many features-- but get to know it.  While USB is nice, not all computers  have it, and Windows 98 is necessary.  Also the 30-60mm zoom is no where  near as good as I would have liked-- DEFINETLY a 3x zoom is required.  While the resolution is nice, remember that that's not all to a digital  camera.
summary: Nice First Impression, But Get To Know Him
